thread.title: Phil Neville urges Wayne Rooney to snub China interest and "stick it out" at Manchester United
thread.title_full: Phil Neville urges Wayne Rooney to snub China interest and "stick it out" at Manchester United

author: Liam Prenderville
title: Phil Neville urges Wayne Rooney to snub China interest and "stick it out" at Manchester United
text:
Sport Phil Neville urges Wayne Rooney to snub China interest and "stick it out" at Manchester United The Red Devils captain has been linked with a blockbuster switch to the Far East after losing his place under Jose Mourinho but Neville says he should stay put Share Rooney speaks to Neville during United training (Photo: John Peters) Share Get football   Thank you for subscribing!   
Wayne Rooney has been urged to snub a move to China and fight for his Manchester United future. 
The Red Devils captain has been linked with a blockbuster switch to the Far East after losing his place under Jose Mourinho. 
Mourinho has suggested Rooney will decide his own future, with a week remaining in the Chinese Super League transfer window. 
But Neville , who played with and coached Rooney, has urged him to stay with United - at least until the end of the season. 
"What I would say to him is 'stick it out at Manchester United'", Neville told BBC Radio 5 live. Rooney in action during training (Photo: Man Utd via Getty Images)) Rooney talks to Jose Mourinho (Photo: 2017 Getty Images) 
"At the moment, he's not in the team and has got a slight knock but Mkhitaryan has gone off injured tonight. 
"You never know, he could come on in the final on Sunday and make a massive impact, score, and then finish the season so well. 
"You've seen it so many times. 
"I don't think he should write off his Manchester United career at this moment in time." Phil Neville smiles (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
